snippet.title: POLAR BEAR IN SPACE! - Official Promo Video
snippet.description:
Psytronik Software in association with RGCD are delighted to present an absolutely stunning debut release for the C64 from Unrolled Loop Studios LLC - POLAR BEAR IN SPACE! Take control of an extremely cute Polar Bear in his quest to run, jump and zap through various alien-infested levels whilst collecting krystals. 

PHOTOSENSITIVE WARNING: This video contains flashing lights and other visual patterns, which may trigger seizures for those with photosensitivity issues. Even if you do not have a history of seizures, this condition may be undiagnosed and can be triggered by these visuals in the video. If you experience any lightheadedness, altered vision, eye twitching, or other symptoms while watching the video, please immediately stop watching and consult a doctor.
